title.rendered: STEDI ST1K 13.5 INCH E-MARK LED LIGHT BAR

content.rendered:
Our new ST1K-12LED is E-Mark approved making it road-legal in Europe and New Zealand.

THE ULTIMATE WING LIGHT ECE COMPLIANT

THE NEW BENCHMARK

E-MARK COMPLIANT BEAM

Our new ST1K series is ECE approved, making it road-legal in Europe and New Zealand.

Featuring our innovative hooded reflector design with rear-facing LEDs enables unprecedented beam control – not possible with more conventional optics. The 12 LED variant is ideal for mounting as shoulder lights on the bull bar wings.

 

HIGH-END DESIGN MEETS HIGH PERFORMANCE

The multi-faceted hooded reflectors distribute a wide beam in the mid-field, with no wasted light on treetops. The wide-horizontal beam patterns significantly reduce glare caused by road signs.  An ideal companion to the vehicles main beam, filling in the road shoulders and adding beam distance over and above your cars main beam, ensuring you arrive at your destination in total comfort.

 

 

DISCOVER NEW HORIZONS

Urban adventure or journey into the wilderness – The ST1K will get you there. The unique geometry of the 6063 aluminium extrusion body measures at only 38mm in height. The ST1K is the first-ever light bar to feature or innovative edge to edge bonded lens, adding a new dimension in design. The design adds subtle yet high-end styling to any class of vehicle that needs a high performing stealth driving light.

 

DETAILS

THE NERDY STUFF

  • 20 x 5W OSRAM LEDs
  • RFI and EMI suppression circuit. Guaranteed to not interfere with Radio or GPS Equipment
  • IP68 – Submersible to 3m
  • Environmentally sealed Deutsch DT-2 connectors
  • Innovative hooded optics
  • Driving Beam E mark compliant beam.
  • Heavy Duty Adjustable Bottom Mounts & Side bracket included.
  • Reverse Polarity Protected Circuit (RPPC)
  • Electronic Thermal Management
  • Built-in Voltage Surge Protection

SPECIFICATIONS

LED MANUFACTURER OSRAM
LED COUNT 12
VOLTAGE 9V – 32V
CURRENT DRAW (AMPERES) 4.0a @13.6v
LENS MATERIAL OPTICAL GRADE, HARD COATED LEXAN
RAW LUMENS 3,552Lm
PEAK INTENSITY (CANDELA) 134,435cd
HOUSING MATERIAL A360.0 Cast face plate, extruded Aluminum heat sink
LIFESPAN 50,000
FLOOD BEAM 50°
SPOT BEAM 9°
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
OPERATING TEMP -40˚C ~ +150˚C
WEIGHT 0.845kg

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • ST1K 13.5 Inch LED Light Bar
  • Installation Manual

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
